dcterms:creator: G. Inches
F. Crestani
dcterms:description: The PAN2012 dataset is provided in the context of the Sexual Predator Identification (SPI) Task, containing a large number of chat conversations with various lengths and a high noise level, which includes chat abbreviations and cyber slangs.
dcterms:title: PAN2012 Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. L. Maas
et al
dcterms:description: The IMDB Large Movie Review Dataset provides 50,000 binary labeled reviews extracted from IMDB, focusing on highly polar movie reviews split evenly into training and test samples.
dcterms:title: IMDB Large Movie Review Dataset
